doc: So, I want to use this issue as an overview for the various todos and steps in making the apps settings more user friendly, appealing and integrated with the appstore.
Discussion and todos are from #2533 and the 12 overview #2672 .
- [x] Make the installed (enable/disabled) apps a table PR: #3195
- [ ] Introduce proper sorting in table view
- [x] Redesign the appstore categories overview with bigger screenshots, etc.
- [x] Add icons to the menu entries #3987 + #6627
- [x] Link to the appstore details page
- [ ] OR Introduce a details page (pop-up) for each app #3193
- [ ] OR Show app details in a right sidebar #2138
- [ ] Make it possible to uninstall enabled apps (trigger disable and then uninstall)
- [ ] Make categories enabled/disabled/update filters, to reduce request
